00034 namespace SPK

00036             class ModifierGroup;
00037 
00042             enum ModifierTrigger
00043             {
00044                         ALWAYS = 1 << 0,                                
00045                         INSIDE_ZONE = 1 << 1,               
00046                         OUTSIDE_ZONE = 1 << 2,              
00047                         INTERSECT_ZONE = 1 << 3,            
00048                         ENTER_ZONE = 1 << 4,                
00049                         EXIT_ZONE = 1 << 5,                             
00050             };
00051 
00064             class SPK_PREFIX Modifier : public Registerable,
00065                                                                                                 public Transformable,
00066                                                                                                 public BufferHandler
00067             {
00068             friend class ModifierGroup;
00069             friend class Group;
00070             friend class Particle;

00296             inline void Modifier::innerUpdateTransform()
00297             {
00298                         if (zone != NULL)
00299                                     zone->updateTransform(getParent());
00300             }
00301 
00302             inline void Modifier::endProcess(Group& group)
00303             {
00304                         active = savedActive; // Restores the active state of the modifier
00305             }
00306 
00307             inline void Modifier::process(Particle& particle,float deltaTime) const
00308             {
00309                         switch(trigger)
00310                         {
00311                         case ALWAYS :
00312                                     modify(particle,deltaTime);
00313                                     break;
00314 
00315                         case INSIDE_ZONE :
00316                                     if ((zone == NULL)||(zone->contains(particle.position())))
00317                                                 modify(particle,deltaTime);
00318                                     else
00319                                                 modifyWrongSide(particle,true);
00320                                     break;
00321 
00322                         case OUTSIDE_ZONE :
00323                                     if (zone == NULL)
00324                                                 return;
00325                                     if (!zone->contains(particle.position()))
00326                                                 modify(particle,deltaTime);
00327                                     else
00328                                                 modifyWrongSide(particle,false);
00329                                     break;
00330 
00331                         case INTERSECT_ZONE :
00332                                     if (zone == NULL)
00333                                                 return;
00334                                     if (zone->intersects(particle.oldPosition(),
00335                                                 particle.position(),
00336                                                 needsIntersection ? &intersection : NULL,
00337                                                 needsNormal ? &normal : NULL))
00338                                                 modify(particle,deltaTime);
00339                                     break;
00340 
00341                         case ENTER_ZONE :
00342                                     if (zone == NULL)
00343                                                 return;
00344                                     if (zone->contains(particle.oldPosition()))
00345                                                 modifyWrongSide(particle,true);
00346                                     else if (zone->intersects(particle.oldPosition(),
00347                                                 particle.position(),
00348                                                 needsIntersection ? &intersection : NULL,
00349                                                 needsNormal ? &normal : NULL))
00350                                                 modify(particle,deltaTime);
00351                                     break;
00352 
00353                         case EXIT_ZONE :
00354                                     if (zone == NULL)
00355                                                 return;
00356                                     if (!zone->contains(particle.oldPosition()))
00357                                                 modifyWrongSide(particle,false);
00358                                     else if (zone->intersects(particle.oldPosition(),
00359                                                 particle.position(),
00360                                                 needsIntersection ? &intersection : NULL,
00361                                                 needsNormal ? &normal : NULL))
00362                                                 modify(particle,deltaTime);
00363                                     break;
00364                         }
00365             }
00366 }
